title: Game designer Sid Meier born Feb. 24, 1954
content:
Legendary game designer Sid Meier was born February 24, 1954. After creating a run of popular flight simulators in the early and mid 1980s, he shifted to strategy games in the second half of the decade, creating some of the

The post Game designer Sid Meier born Feb. 24, 1954 appeared first on The Silicon Underground.
